mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (i_board_type, i_user, board_nm, board_ctnt , secret) VALUE (#{i_board_type}, #{i_user}, #{board_nm}, #{board_ctnt}, #{secret});
mapper.select: SELECT i_board, t_board.i_board_type AS i_board_type, i_user, board_nm, board_ctnt, board_favorite, secret, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, r_dt, NOW()) AS r_dt, type_title, t_board_type.board_hit FROM t_board LEFT JOIN t_board_type ON t_board.i_board_type = t_board_type.i_board_type WHERE t_board.i_board_type = #{i_board_type} AND i_board = #{i_board};
mapper.update: UPDATE t_board SET board_nm = #{board_nm}, board_ctnt = #{board_ctnt}, secret = #{secret}, r_dt = NOW() WHERE i_board = #{i_board};
mapper.select: SELECT a.i_board, a.i_board_type, a.i_user, a.board_nm, a.board_ctnt, a.board_favorite, a.secret, (SELECT count(t_favorite.i_user) FROM t_favorite WHERE t_favorite.i_board = a.i_board) AS favorite, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, a.r_dt, NOW()) AS r_dt, a.board_hit, (SELECT t_board_type.type_title FROM t_board_type WHERE t_board_type.i_board_type = a.i_board_type) AS type_title, (SELECT everyuser.user_nm FROM everyuser WHERE everyuser.i_user = a.i_user) AS user_nm, (SELECT count(board_cmt.i_cmt) FROM board_cmt WHERE a.i_board = board_cmt.i_board) AS cmt FROM t_board a WHERE a.i_board_type = #{i_board_type} AND a.i_board = #{i_board};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cmt (i_user, i_board, ctnt) VALUES (#{i_user}, #{i_board}, #{ctnt});
